Material.Name: material
Material.Components: a piece of ice or a small white rock chip

Spell.Name: Snilloc's Snowball Swarm
Spell.Description: A flurry of magic snowballs erupts from a point you choose within range. Each creature in a 5- foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Description.Name: At Higher Levels
Description.Text: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.
